song_name: Night of Your Life (feat. Jennifer Hudson)
lyrics:
18 contributorsnight of your life lyricsverse 1 jennifer hudson
boy i see ya lookin at me
i feel your eyes on me like you gotta have me
watchin every move like its for you
you cant help it youre attracted like a magnet

my love aint easy
you gon have to put in some work
you cant buy me a drink thinkin ima fall for your flirt
you gotta make it right
if you wanna go spend some time
you gotta raise the bar tonight

prechorus jennifer hudson
love me baby treat me right
make it eternity and not only one night
if you love me til the end of time
then i will promise you the night of your life

chorus jennifer hudson
so now love me baby treat me right
and well be ridin it from mornin til midnight
if you love me til the end of time
then i will promise you the night of your life
night of your life life life life life life
night of your life life life life life life
see david guetta liveget tickets as low as 80you might also likeverse 2 jennifer hudson
i could have ya if i wanted to
down on one knee in front of me wedding bells ringin
i could claim ya be your savior
wrap your heart inside of these arms and youll never leave
i could have your hands tied round my body all up on me
boy youll be stuck to me if i wanted with no release
ill have you beggin wishin now i give you a piece
baby youll never be the same

prechorus jennifer hudson
love me baby treat me right
make it eternity and not only one night
if you love me til the end of time
then i will promise you the night of your life

chorus jennifer hudson
so now love me baby treat me right
and well be ridin it from mornin til midnight
if you love me til the end of time
then i will promise you the night of your life
night of your life life life life life life
night of your life life life life life life

bridge jennifer hudson
taller than a mountain deeper than the sea
youre boilin hot for me babe one hundred degrees
i want you to love me like your favorite dream
lets make tonight a reality
chorus jennifer hudson
so now love me baby treat me right
and well be ridin it from mornin til midnight oh
if you love me til the end of time til the end of time baby
then i will promise you the night of your life night of your life
night of your life life life life life life
night of your life life life life life life night of your life
night of your life life life life life life
